016package io.micronaut.maven;
017
018import io.micronaut.maven.core.MicronautRuntime;
019import io.micronaut.maven.jib.JibMicronautExtension;
020import io.micronaut.maven.services.ApplicationConfigurationService;
021import io.micronaut.maven.services.DockerService;
022import io.micronaut.maven.jib.JibConfigurationService;
023import io.micronaut.maven.services.ExecutorService;
024import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
025import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Mojo;
026import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.ResolutionScope;
027import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
028import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.MavenInvocationException;
029
030import javax.inject.Inject;
031import java.io.File;
032import java.io.IOException;
033import java.nio.file.Files;
034import java.nio.file.Path;
035import java.nio.file.Paths;
036import java.util.ArrayList;
037import java.util.List;
038import java.util.Optional;
039import java.util.stream.Collectors;
040import java.util.stream.Stream;
041
042import static io.micronaut.maven.DockerNativeMojo.ARGS_FILE_PROPERTY_NAME;
043
044/**
045 * <p>Generates a <code>Dockerfile</code> depending on the <code>packaging</code> and <code>micronaut.runtime</code>
046 * properties.
047 *
048 * <pre>mvn mn:dockerfile -Dpackaging=docker-native -Dmicronaut.runtime=lambda</pre>
049 *
050 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
051 * @since 1.1
052 */
053@Mojo(name = "dockerfile", requiresDependencyResolution = ResolutionScope.COMPILE_PLUS_RUNTIME)
054public class DockerfileMojo extends AbstractDockerMojo {
055
056    public static final String DOCKERFILE = "Dockerfile";
057    public static final String DOCKERFILE_AWS_CUSTOM_RUNTIME = "DockerfileAwsCustomRuntime";
058    public static final String DOCKERFILE_NATIVE = "DockerfileNative";
059    public static final String DOCKERFILE_CRAC = "DockerfileCrac";
060    public static final String DOCKERFILE_CRAC_CHECKPOINT = "DockerfileCracCheckpoint";
061    public static final String DOCKERFILE_CRAC_CHECKPOINT_FILE = "Dockerfile.crac.checkpoint";
062    public static final String DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_DISTROLESS = "DockerfileNativeDistroless";
063    public static final String DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_STATIC = "DockerfileNativeStatic";
064    public static final String DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_ORACLE_CLOUD = "DockerfileNativeOracleCloud";
065
066    private final ExecutorService executorService;
067
068    @Inject
069    public DockerfileMojo(MavenProject mavenProject, DockerService dockerService, JibConfigurationService jibConfigurationService,
070                          ApplicationConfigurationService applicationConfigurationService, ExecutorService executorService) {
071        super(mavenProject, jibConfigurationService, applicationConfigurationService, dockerService);
072        this.executorService = executorService;
073    }
074
075    @Override
076    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
077        MicronautRuntime runtime = MicronautRuntime.valueOf(micronautRuntime.toUpperCase());
078        Packaging packaging = Packaging.of(mavenProject.getPackaging());
079        try {
080            copyDependencies();
081            Optional<File> dockerfile = switch (packaging) {
082                case DOCKER_NATIVE -> buildDockerfileNative(runtime);
083                case DOCKER -> buildDockerfile(runtime);
084                case DOCKER_CRAC -> buildCracDockerfile(runtime);
085                default -> throw new MojoExecutionException("Packaging is set to [" + packaging + "]. To generate a Dockerfile, set the packaging to either [" + Packaging.DOCKER.id() + "] or [" + Packaging.DOCKER_NATIVE.id() + "]");
086            };
087
088            dockerfile.ifPresent(file -> getLog().info("Dockerfile written to: " + file.getAbsolutePath()));
089
090        } catch (IOException | MavenInvocationException e) {
091            throw new MojoExecutionException(e.getMessage(), e);
092        }
093    }
094
095    private Optional<File> buildDockerfile(MicronautRuntime runtime) throws IOException {
096        File dockerfile;
097        switch (runtime.getBuildStrategy()) {
098            case ORACLE_FUNCTION -> {
099                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource("DockerfileOracleCloud");
100                processOracleFunctionDockerfile(dockerfile);
101            }
102            case LAMBDA, DEFAULT -> {
103                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DOCKERFILE);
104                processDockerfile(dockerfile);
105            }
106            default -> throw new IllegalStateException("Unexpected value: " + runtime.getBuildStrategy());
107        }
108        return Optional.ofNullable(dockerfile);
109    }
110
111    private Optional<File> buildCracDockerfile(MicronautRuntime runtime) throws IOException, MojoExecutionException {
112        File dockerfile;
113        switch (runtime.getBuildStrategy()) {
114            case ORACLE_FUNCTION -> throw new MojoExecutionException("Oracle Functions are currently unsupported");
115            case LAMBDA -> throw new MojoExecutionException("Lambda Functions are currently unsupported");
116            case DEFAULT -> {
117                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DOCKERFILE_CRAC_CHECKPOINT, DOCKERFILE_CRAC_CHECKPOINT_FILE);
118                processDockerfile(dockerfile);
119                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DOCKERFILE_CRAC);
120                processDockerfile(dockerfile);
121            }
122            default -> throw new IllegalStateException("Unexpected value: " + runtime.getBuildStrategy());
123        }
124        return Optional.ofNullable(dockerfile);
125    }
126
127    private void processOracleFunctionDockerfile(File dockerfile) throws IOException {
128        if (dockerfile != null) {
129            List<String> allLines = Files.readAllLines(dockerfile.toPath());
130            allLines.add(0, allLines.remove(0) + JibMicronautExtension.determineProjectFnVersion());
131            String entrypoint = JibMicronautExtension.buildProjectFnEntrypoint()
132                    .stream()
133                    .map(s -> "\"" + s + "\"")
134                    .collect(Collectors.joining(", "));
135
136            allLines.add("ENTRYPOINT [" + entrypoint + "]");
137
138            Files.write(dockerfile.toPath(), allLines);
139        }
140    }
141
142    private Optional<File> buildDockerfileNative(MicronautRuntime runtime) throws IOException, MavenInvocationException {
143        getLog().info("Generating GraalVM args file");
144        executorService.invokeGoal("org.graalvm.buildtools:native-maven-plugin", "write-args-file");
145        File dockerfile;
146        switch (runtime.getBuildStrategy()) {
147            case LAMBDA -> {
148                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DOCKERFILE_AWS_CUSTOM_RUNTIME);
149            }
150            case ORACLE_FUNCTION -> {
151                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_ORACLE_CLOUD);
152            }
153            case DEFAULT -> {
154                String dockerfileName = DOCKERFILE_NATIVE;
155                if (staticNativeImage) {
156                    getLog().info("Generating a static native image");
157                    dockerfileName = DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_STATIC;
158                } else if (baseImageRun.contains("distroless")) {
159                    getLog().info("Generating a mostly static native image");
160                    dockerfileName = DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_DISTROLESS;
161                }
162                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(dockerfileName);
163            }
164            default -> throw new IllegalStateException("Unexpected value: " + runtime.getBuildStrategy());
165        }
166        processDockerfile(dockerfile);
167        return Optional.ofNullable(dockerfile);
168
169    }
170
171    private void processDockerfile(File dockerfile) throws IOException {
172        if (dockerfile != null) {
173            List<String> allLines = Files.readAllLines(dockerfile.toPath());
174            List<String> result = new ArrayList<>();
175
176            for (String line : allLines) {
177                if (!line.startsWith("ARG")) {
178                    if (line.contains("BASE_IMAGE_RUN")) {
179                        result.add(line.replace("${BASE_IMAGE_RUN}", baseImageRun));
180                    } else if (line.contains("BASE_IMAGE")) {
181                        result.add(line.replace("${BASE_IMAGE}", getFrom()));
182                    } else if (line.contains("EXTRA_CMD")) {
183                        if (baseImageRun.contains("alpine-glibc")) {
184                            result.add("RUN apk update && apk add libstdc++");
185                        } else {
186                            result.add("");
187                        }
188                    } else if (line.contains("GRAALVM_") || line.contains("CLASS_NAME")) {
189                        result.add(line
190                                .replace("${GRAALVM_VERSION}", graalVmVersion())
191                                .replace("${GRAALVM_JVM_VERSION}", graalVmJvmVersion())
192                                .replace("${GRAALVM_ARCH}", graalVmArch())
193                                .replace("${CLASS_NAME}", mainClass)
194                        );
195                    } else if (line.contains("PORT")) {
196                        result.add(line.replace("${PORT}", getPort()));
197                    } else {
198                        result.add(line);
199                    }
200                }
201            }
202
203            String argsFile = mavenProject.getProperties().getProperty(ARGS_FILE_PROPERTY_NAME);
204            if (argsFile == null) {
205                Path targetPath = Paths.get(mavenProject.getBuild().getDirectory());
206                try (Stream<Path> listStream = Files.list(targetPath)) {
207                    Path argsFilePath = listStream
208                            .map(path -> path.getFileName().toString())
209                            .filter(f -> f.startsWith("native-image") && f.endsWith("args"))
210                            .map(targetPath::resolve)
211                            .findFirst()
212                            .orElse(null);
213                    if (argsFilePath != null) {
214                        argsFile = argsFilePath.toAbsolutePath().toString();
215                    }
216                }
217            }
218            if (argsFile != null) {
219                List<String> allNativeImageBuildArgs = MojoUtils.computeNativeImageArgs(nativeImageBuildArgs, baseImageRun, argsFile);
220                getLog().info("GraalVM native image build args: " + allNativeImageBuildArgs);
221            }
222
223            if (appArguments != null && !appArguments.isEmpty()) {
224                getLog().info("Using application arguments: " + appArguments);
225                result.add(getCmd());
226            }
227
228            Files.write(dockerfile.toPath(), result);
229        }
230    }
231}
